mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Spin Dizzy", "Yes, Sir, That's My Baby", "Just Because", and "California One-Step". SPECIAL FEATURES "Everybody D-A-A-ANCE!", "A Bit about your Square Dance Magazine Sets in Order", "Today's Round Dances", "For the Love of Mike: A Non-Technical Glimpse At A", and "Highly Technical Caller Problem". REGULAR FEATURES "As I See It", "Help! For Your Square Dance Club", "Meet Our Guest Caller: Paul Phillips", "'Round the Outside Ring", "The Square of the Month: Lefty Allemande", "The Green Sheet", "From the Floor", and "On the Record".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
